meaningMnemonic: The <radical>sun</radical> is being <radical>call</radical>ed on to <radical>boil</radical> the earth by <kanji>illuminating</kanji> it.
readingMnemonic: The person who calls the sun asking it to <kanji>illuminate</kanji> the earth is the <reading>Shou</reading>gun (しょう). It's very specifically the Shougun's responsibility to make sure the earth is illuminated every morning.
